CIVIL stands for Capturing Images from Video Library, a simplified Java library to capture images from a camera such as a QuickCam or WebCam.

CIVIL stands for Capturing Images from Video Library, a simplified Java library to capture images from a camera such as a QuickCam or WebCam.
